name: Palmchip
overview:
Palmchip Corporation provides outsourced software, firmware, and hardware design services to its clients in the United States, Europe, and internationally. It offers software design services for embedded systems development and systems programming, networking and distributed systems, mobile and handheld applications, Microsoft .net based n-tiered applications, Java/J2EE based n-tiered applications, Web 2.0 applications, and geographic information systems. The company also provides hardware design services for embedded controllers, flash disks, hard disk drives, telecom systems, PC boards, and FPGA systems. In addition, it develops and licenses Market Specific Standard Platform (MSSP), a system-on-chip software and hardware technology. The companyâ€™s technology is used in PDAs, mobile phones, wireless modems, digital cameras, Bluetooth, digital media adapters, home gateways, smartcards, DVD players, optical networking equipment, print servers, network attached storage, and HDD and FDD devices. It serves its clients in telecom, energy, consumer electronics, entertainment, financial services, government, non-profit, software, and hi-tech sectors.

Palmchip Corporation was founded in 1996 and is based in Santa Clara, California with offshore offices in Lahore and Islamabad, Pakistan.
